name: Electronic Cigarette Industry Platform
membership: eCIP does not belong to any association.
goal:
The objective of the eCIP is to facilitate and achieve compliance with REACH and the CLP Regulation of companies involved in the manufacturing of e-cigarettes and refill containers.

The eCIP members act in full compliance with EU competition law.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives: Implementation of REACH and the CLP Regulation with regard to e-cigarettes and refill containers, and substances and mixtures contained therein.
